analyzed: sangs rgyas sangs rgyas min par ji ltar rten //
translated: How can buddhas and non-buddhas be supported?

original: zhi dang 'khrul pa'i dri ma'i rnyong pas gos pa'i yid ni dag pas dkar ba'i gzugs //
analyzed: zhi dang 'khrul pa'i dri ma'i rnyong pas gos pa'i yid ni dag pas dkar ba'i gzugs //
translated: The mind, tainted by the stains of peace and confusion, is the white form of purity.

original: sems can bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i yid kyis rgyas ba ser ba'i 'od //
analyzed: sems can bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i yid kyis rgyas ba ser ba'i 'od //
translated: The mind that fulfills the wishes of sentient beings is the yellow light of expansion.

original: dmar po 'dod chags rnam dag kun gyi dbang gis cho ga la ni sbyor gyur pa //
analyzed: dmar po 'dod chags rnam dag kun gyi dbang gis cho ga la ni sbyor gyur pa //
translated: The red one, the purity of passion, is applied to the ritual through the power of all.

original: bya ba nan tan zhes bya'i ngo bo rgyur pas bee d'u ry'a yi kha dog 'bar //
analyzed: bya ba nan tan zhes bya'i ngo bo rgyur pas bee d'u ry'a yi kha dog 'bar //
translated: The essence of the one called “Action” is the color of lapis lazuli, blazing.

original: zhe sngar nyon mongs rnam dag kyang ni shin tu sdang ba rnams la gnas pa'i 'od //
analyzed: zhe sngar nyon mongs rnam dag kyang ni shin tu sdang ba rnams la gnas pa'i 'od //
translated: The one called “Hatred” is pure, but its light abides in the most hateful.🔽Since the mirror and so on are not accepted, how is it that here hatred is?

original: me long la sogs mi 'dod pas na ji ltar yang 'dir zhes sdang dag / rdo rje can gyis me long sogs su gyur pa sngon po'i gzugs su gang gis yin //
analyzed: me long la sogs mi 'dod pas na ji ltar yang 'dir zhes sdang dag / rdo rje can gyis me long sogs su gyur pa sngon po'i gzugs su gang gis yin //
translated: O Vajra Holder, how is it that the mirror and so on become the blue form?

original: ci'i phyir dbus su zhe sdang rnam dag grub sku dkar po la sogs mdzes par 'gyur //
analyzed: ci'i phyir dbus su zhe sdang rnam dag grub sku dkar po la sogs mdzes par 'gyur //
translated: Why is the pure hatred in the center, the beautiful white body, and so on?

original: ji ltar spyir btang la yang 'di ni nang 'dus rang gi bdag dang mi bskyod gnyis //
analyzed: ji ltar spyir btang la yang 'di ni nang 'dus rang gi bdag dang mi bskyod gnyis //
translated: Just as it is said in general, this is the inner gathering, one’s own nature, and Akṣobhya.

original: de'i phyir bde bar gshegs par gcig gyur gzhan min de yi gzugs mi bsten //
analyzed: de'i phyir bde bar gshegs par gcig gyur gzhan min de yi gzugs mi bsten //
translated: Therefore, the Sugata is one, not another, and one should not rely on his form.

original: 'di ltar gzhan du 'gal ba spang ba'i blo rnams ji ltar yang dag gsungs //
analyzed: 'di ltar gzhan du 'gal ba spang ba'i blo rnams ji ltar yang dag gsungs //
translated: In this way, the mind that abandons contradictions is said to be correct.

original: tha dad ye shes kyis byas gyur pas ji ltar sgrol ma la sogs gnyis su rtogs //
analyzed: tha dad ye shes kyis byas gyur pas ji ltar sgrol ma la sogs gnyis su rtogs //
translated: Since it is made by different gnoses, how is Tārā and so on imagined to be two?

original: ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid rnam ni 'di rnams nges par ye shes so so ste //
analyzed: ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid rnam ni 'di rnams nges par ye shes so so ste //
translated: These are definitely the individual pristine consciousnesses.

original: lhag par grags pa gang gis gang du myur ba ye shes de'i dag pa //
analyzed: lhag par grags pa gang gis gang du myur ba ye shes de'i dag pa //
translated: The purity of that pristine consciousness is the renown of whatever is swift.

original: ye shes kyis 'gyur kha dog gnas pa rtog @144a * //
analyzed: ye shes kyis 'gyur kha dog gnas pa rtog @144a * //
translated: The color of pristine consciousness is the abode.

original: pas gal te kha dog yin gyur na //
analyzed: pas gal te kha dog yin gyur na //
translated: If it were color,

original: dkyil 'khor bdag po 'jam dpal gsal ba nyid du nges par bdag po nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bdag po 'jam dpal gsal ba nyid du nges par bdag po nyid du 'gyur //
translated: it would definitely be the color of Mañjuśrī, the lord of the maṇḍala.

original: rdo rje can gyi lugs ni gal te 'ga' zhig yod na bde gshegs gnas la brten //
analyzed: rdo rje can gyi lugs ni gal te 'ga' zhig yod na bde gshegs gnas la brten //
translated: If there is any system of the vajra holder, it is based on the abode of the sugatas.

original: rang rigs dbang phyug dang ni rgyal ba'i sras po 'khor lo'i bdag por gnas par bya //
analyzed: rang rigs dbang phyug dang ni rgyal ba'i sras po 'khor lo'i bdag por gnas par bya //
translated: One should abide as the lord of the wheel, the powerful lord of one’s own family, the son of the jinas.

original: sangs rgyas sangs rgyas ma yin bdag nyid ngor mtshon gang zhig gsang ba'i 'khor dbang phyug //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sangs rgyas ma yin bdag nyid ngor mtshon gang zhig gsang ba'i 'khor dbang phyug //
translated: The secret lord of the maṇḍala is the one who is indicated to the self, whether a buddha or not a buddha.

original: mi bskyod nges par bdag por gyur na rnam par sang snang mdzad la sogs gnyis su 'gyur //
analyzed: mi bskyod nges par bdag por gyur na rnam par sang snang mdzad la sogs gnyis su 'gyur //
translated: If Akṣobhya definitely becomes the lord, the two, Vairocana, and so on, arise.

original: dpal ldan ye shes zhabs kyi lam zhugs bla ma rjes bsten pas //
analyzed: dpal ldan ye shes zhabs kyi lam zhugs bla ma rjes bsten pas //
translated: The one who follows the path of the glorious Jñānapāda and follows the guru

original: bdag gis man ngag khyad par gang zhig cung zad thob gyur pa //
analyzed: bdag gis man ngag khyad par gang zhig cung zad thob gyur pa //
translated: Whatever special instructions I have obtained a little bit,🔽I have not let them be lost from my mind,

original: 'di ni de yid rang pa nyams par ma gyur zhes phyir dang // de phyir 'di ni yang dag sprel pa bdag mnyam blo la phan phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ni de yid rang pa nyams par ma gyur zhes phyir dang // de phyir 'di ni yang dag sprel pa bdag mnyam blo la phan phyir ro //
translated: so that this may be of benefit to those of equal fortune to me.

original: legs par bsdu byas bde ba'i sgrub thabs byang chub lam thob pa ;
analyzed: legs par bsdu byas bde ba'i sgrub thabs byang chub lam thob pa ;
translated: This method of practice, well-compiled, leads to the attainment of the path of enlightenment.

original: /'dir ni bdag gis gang zhig mnyam pa med pa'i bsod nams grangs //
analyzed: /'dir ni bdag gis gang zhig mnyam pa med pa'i bsod nams grangs //
translated: Here, whatever merit I have accumulated, incomparable,

original: dpal ldan gsang ba 'dus pa'i cho ga nyid kyis skyon spangs pa //
analyzed: dpal ldan gsang ba 'dus pa'i cho ga nyid kyis skyon spangs pa //
translated: by the very ritual of glorious Guhyasamaja, free from faults,🔽may beings attain the state of supreme enlightenment.

original: de yis byang chub mchog gi go 'phang skye bo thob par shog / rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras kyis gdul bya ma yin spangs gyur pa //
analyzed: de yis byang chub mchog gi go 'phang skye bo thob par shog / rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras kyis gdul bya ma yin spangs gyur pa //
translated: The Victorious Ones and their sons have abandoned those not to be trained,

original: bsam gyis mi khyab rnams la phyogs bcur gnas pa'i sems can rnams //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab rnams la phyogs bcur gnas pa'i sems can rnams //
translated: and the inconceivable ones abide in the ten directions.

original: de yis byang chub sgrub pa'i ched du rgyal bas byin zhes pas //
analyzed: de yis byang chub sgrub pa'i ched du rgyal bas byin zhes pas //
translated: For the sake of their attainment of enlightenment, the Victorious One's son called Ajita

original: dga' ba'i sgrub thabs zhes grags 'di ni bdag gis bkod //
analyzed: dga' ba'i sgrub thabs zhes grags 'di ni bdag gis bkod //
translated: has composed this known as the Method of Practice of Hevajra.

original: dga' ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon chen po rgyal bas byin pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: dga' ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon chen po rgyal bas byin pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The method of accomplishing the joy composed by the great master Jinadatta is complete.

original: // / pandi ta padma ka ra wa rma dang / lo ts'a ba rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur//
analyzed: // / pandi ta padma ka ra wa rma dang / lo ts'a ba rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur//
translated: By the pandit Padmakara and the translator Rinchen Zangpo.
